title: Jerry Warren | The Violent and the Damned (Crime, 1962) Full Movie | Colorized

sources.title: Jerry Warren | The Violent and the Damned (Crime, 1962) Full Movie | Colorized
sources.description:
When chain gang prisoners attack their guards, some of the hardened criminals escape Brazil’s infamous Anchieta Prison amidst all the pick-ax carnage. The government dispatches a machine-gun squad to round up the fugitives, who have fled by foot and boat and now have begun to turn on each other.

Original title: Med mord i bagaget & Edited from Mãos Sangrentas (1955)

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/0gb9DJJNO6Q


Directors: Carlos Hugo Christensen, Jerry Warren
Writers: Carlos Hugo Christensen, Pedro Juan Vignalle
Stars: Arturo de Córdova, Carlos Cotrim, Sadi Cabral
Genres: Colorized classics, Crime, Drama

This film is subtitled in many language options.

00:00 Full Movie
01:13 Criminal activities and challenges faced in Panama by a group of individuals, including resistance from military forces.
04:57 Psychologist called to address rising violence in prison. Concerns about lack of change despite multiple visits and new situations.
7:38 Intense conversation between a doctor and a visitor about the treatment of prisoners and a recent violent incident.
10:03 Understanding the psychological impact of the environment on individuals in a notorious island prison.
12:36 Prison break, detailed plan, weapons stash, 7 years of waiting.
21:24 Tensions rise as characters discuss money and escape plans, followed by a dramatic encounter in a cafe.
34:44 Intense drama unfolds as characters navigate through a dangerous situation.
